statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size > 100;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'armor' AND asset_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('weapon', 'armor') ORDER BY asset_size ASC, asset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, format FROM textures WHERE size > 100;
SELECT id, name, format FROM textures WHERE name LIKE '%wood%';
SELECT * FROM models WHERE vertex_count < 500;
SELECT name, file_path FROM models WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name, size, format FROM textures WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT name, vertex_count FROM models WHERE vertex_count < 5000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM textures JOIN models ON textures.id = models.id WHERE textures.size > 2000 AND models.vertex_count < 10000;
SELECT name, file_path FROM models WHERE name LIKE '%car%' AND file_path IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, format FROM textures WHERE size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, size FROM textures WHERE size > 100;
SELECT id, name, format FROM textures WHERE format = 'PNG';
SELECT * FROM models WHERE vertices > 500;
SELECT name, vertices, faces FROM models WHERE faces < 1000;
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE size > 100 AND format = 'PNG';
SELECT name, size FROM textures ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT AVG(duration) FROM animations;
SELECT name, vertices, faces FROM models WHERE faces >= 500 ORDER BY vertices ASC;
SELECT * FROM animations WHERE frames BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM textures;
SELECT texture_id, texture_name, texture_size FROM textures WHERE texture_type = 'wood';
SELECT texture_name, texture_type FROM textures WHERE texture_size > 100;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type, asset_description FROM game_assets;
SELECT model_name, model_file_path FROM models WHERE model_type = 'character' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE texture_size > 100 ORDER BY texture_name ASC;
SELECT texture_id, texture_name FROM textures WHERE texture_type = 'organic';
SELECT asset_name, asset_description FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'sound' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM models WHERE model_type = 'character' AND model_name LIKE '%hero%';
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_type FROM models WHERE model_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY model_id;
SELECT * FROM Textures;
SELECT name, format FROM Textures WHERE size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Models ORDER BY polygon_count DESC;
SELECT asset_name, created_at FROM Assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT asset_name, related_id, relationship_type FROM AssetMapping WHERE asset_id = 'c26d4883-8847-4c98-ae1e-ba64bf20a466';
SELECT * FROM Textures ORDER BY name ASC, size DESC;
SELECT name, format FROM Textures WHERE size > 1000;
SELECT A.asset_name, M.name, A.created_at FROM Assets A INNER JOIN Models M ON A.asset_id = M.model_id;
SELECT A.asset_name, T.name, T.size FROM Assets A INNER JOIN Textures T ON A.asset_id = T.texture_id WHERE T.size < 5000;
SELECT * FROM AssetMapping WHERE relationship_type = 'parent-child' ORDER BY mapping_id DESC;
